statements: SELECT * FROM purchase_orders
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM purchase_orders
SELECT vendor_id, total_amount FROM purchase_orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders WHERE total_amount > 1000
SELECT vendor_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchase_orders GROUP BY vendor_id
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders WHERE vendor_id = 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM purchase_orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT vendor_id, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM purchase_orders GROUP BY vendor_id HAVING order_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY order_id;
SELECT vendor_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchase_orders GROUP BY vendor_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders;
SELECT id, vendor_id, order_date, total_amount FROM purchase_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_phone = '123-456-7890';
SELECT id, order_date, total_amount FROM purchase_orders WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name ASC, vendor_email DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name ASC
SELECT id, total_amount FROM purchase_orders WHERE vendor_id = 1 AND order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders JOIN vendors ON purchase_orders.vendor_id = vendors.vendor_id WHERE purchase_orders.total_amount < 5000
SELECT vendor_name, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM vendors JOIN purchase_orders ON vendors.vendor_id = purchase_orders.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name HAVING order_count > 3
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors;
SELECT item_name, item_price, item_quantity FROM items WHERE item_price > 50;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, vendor_email, vendor_phone FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT purchase_order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount < 1000;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name = 'Vendor A';
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_email ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_phone FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 2;
SELECT i.item_name, i.item_price, o.total_amount FROM items i INNER JOIN orders o ON i.item_id = o.purchase_order_id;

SELECT v.vendor_name, v.vendor_email, i.item_name, i.item_price FROM vendors v INNER JOIN orders o ON v.vendor_id = o.vendor_id INNER JOIN items i ON o.purchase_order_id = i.item_id ORDER BY v.vendor_name ASC, i.item_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseOrder;
SELECT vendor_id, amount FROM PurchaseOrder WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT order_date, amount FROM PurchaseOrder ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vendor WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT item_name, price FROM Item WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Vendor ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM Item WHERE price > 50;
SELECT order_id, amount FROM PurchaseOrder WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM Vendor WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY vendor_name;
SELECT item_name, description FROM Item WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders;
SELECT vendor_id, order_date FROM purchase_orders WHERE total_amount >= 1000;
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM vendors WHERE contact_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM order_items WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM vendors WHERE id = 5;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT order_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM order_items GROUP BY order_id HAVING total_quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
